Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: This simple yet elegant painting is of a woman relaxingly fishing in the bay. Those who know her would recognize Wynter standing on the pier near the park in docktown. She is painted as a tall, sleek panthress with neatly trimmed, creamy white fur. Her satiny obsidian black hair shining in the glow of the sun is curled neatly in a vine-like bun design and is brilliantly decorated with colorfully painted flowers. Her golden speckled azure eyes seem to be idly gazing out at the horizon, almost daydreaming. She is wearing a lovely pearlescent lilac nainsook v-neck overgown, which covers her mostly from shoulders to feet with just a peek at her lavender moire slippers revealed from beneath. Over her shoulders is draped a beautifully tailored purple cloak bearing the proud symbol of the Rinaldi. Hanging elegantly around her neck are a string of prayer beads. Beside her along the dock is quite an impressive catch of over three dozen fish of great variety. At the bottom left hand corner of the scene, the sun reflecting off the water shines with a resplendent L.
This simple yet elegant painting is of a woman relaxingly fishing in the bay.

Core:Properties.Core:Property:
X[M] if(\$iob \&\& (sizeof(\$iob) == 1)) \{ if(NRefOb(\$iob[0])."base:volition") return TRUE;
if(NRefOb(\$iob[0])."base:environment") \{ \$this."base:environment" = NRefOb(\$iob[0])."base:environment"; \} else \{ \$this."base:environment" = NRefOb(\$iob[0]); \} \$this."base:proximity" = \$iob[0]; \$this."base:stance" = 6; \$this."base:preposition" = 8; \} return TRUE;
